search_results.title: Falling For U
search_results.lyrics:
Falling For U Lyrics[Verse 1]
I was hanging with you
And then I realized
I didn't think it was true
I was surprised
When I found out I'd fallen for you
I didn't wanna believe
My feelings for you
I didn't wanna believe
That I could lose you
If I told you just how I felt
[Verse 2]
But I can't help it
I'm falling for you
And I can't quit it
'Cause I'm stuck on you
And it might be pathetic
And you might be skeptical
But I just want to be with you
Please tell me boy can you
Get a clue or come through
'Cause I just want to be with you

[Bridge]
I'm scared...
Of telling you how I feel
Maybe
It's better
If I just try to conceal
The truth
For me
And for you

[Outro]
But I'm still stuck on you
I
I'm still falling for you
...for youYou might also like42Embed

description.plain: The song is about a girl who falls in love with her friend and she didn’t realize she was in love but once she did she was afraid of telling them and so she decided to keep it a secret and continues to be in love.

song.embed_content: Read “Falling For U” by Peachy! on Genius
song.title: Falling For U

body.plain: The song is about a girl who falls in love with her friend and she didn’t realize she was in love but once she did she was afraid of telling them and so she decided to keep it a secret and continues to be in love.

annotations:
And it might be pathetic
 And you might be skeptical
 But I just want to be with you

I guess what I meant here is that because the two have been friends for so long, the boy she’s got a crush on might just laugh it off if she were to share her feelings. Leaving her to feel a little embarrassed and “pathetic” for even trying to pass into that realm.

But I can’t help it
 I’m falling for you
 And I can’t quit it
 ’Cause I’m stuck on you
She is saying that even though she wants her feelings for her friend to end, she can’t stop loving him.

search_results.title: ​​prom dress
search_results.lyrics:
TranslationsEspañol​​prom dress Lyrics[Verse 1]
I'm nearing the end of my fourth year
I feel like I've been lacking, crying too many tears
Everyone seemed to say it was so great
But did I miss out? Was it a huge mistake?

[Pre-Chorus]
I can't help the fact I like to be alone
It might sound kinda sad, but that's just what I seem to know
I tend to handle things usually by myself
And I can't ever seem to try and ask for help
[Chorus]
I'm sitting here, crying in my prom dress
I'd be the prom queen if crying was a contest
Make-up is running down, feelings are all around
How did I get here? I need to know
I guess I maybe had a couple expectations
Thought I'd get to them, but no, I didn't
I guess I thought that prom was gonna be fun
But now I'm sitting on the floor and all I wanna do is run

[Verse 2]
I keep collections of masks upon my wall
To try and stop myself from revealing it all
Affecting others is the last thing I would do
I keep to myself though I want to break through

[Pre-Chorus]
I hold so many small regrets
And what-ifs down inside my head
Some confidence, it couldn't hurt me
My demeanor is often misread

[Chorus]
I'm sitting here, crying in my prom dress
I'd be the prom queen if crying was a contest
Make-up is running down, feelings are all around
How did I get here? I need to know
I guess I maybe had a couple expectations
Thought I'd get to them, but no, I didn't
I guess I thought that prom was gonna be fun
But now I'm sitting on the floor and all I wanna do is run
You might also like[Post-Chorus]
All I wanna do is run
All I wanna do is run
All I wanna do is run

[Chorus]
I'm sitting here, crying in my prom dress
I'd be the prom queen if crying was a contest
Make-up is running down, feelings are all around
How did I get here? I need to know
I guess I maybe had a couple expectations
Thought I'd get to them, but no, I didn't
I guess I thought that prom was gonna be fun
But now I'm sitting on the floor and all I wanna do is run

[Post-Chorus]
All I wanna do is run33Embed

description.plain:
“prom dress” is the lead single of mxmtoon’s second project, the masquerade. It was met with success on release, reaching over 500,000 streams in just over a week. The song was first conceived after a panic attack she had in her prom dress, which she revealed in an interview with Genius, and after which she promptly tweeted:

crying in a prom dress, what a mood
wait im gonna write a song called that don’t u dare steal it

The song itself is a retrospect on Maia’s prom and overall high school experience having introverted tendencies and, as a result, feeling like it wasn’t what it could have been.

song.embed_content: Read “​​prom dress” by ​mxmtoon on Genius
song.title: ​​prom dress

body.plain:
“prom dress” is the lead single of mxmtoon’s second project, the masquerade. It was met with success on release, reaching over 500,000 streams in just over a week. The song was first conceived after a panic attack she had in her prom dress, which she revealed in an interview with Genius, and after which she promptly tweeted:

crying in a prom dress, what a mood
wait im gonna write a song called that don’t u dare steal it

The song itself is a retrospect on Maia’s prom and overall high school experience having introverted tendencies and, as a result, feeling like it wasn’t what it could have been.

songs.full_title: ​​mxmtoon - prom dress (Traducción al Español) by Genius Traducciones al Español
songs.title: ​​mxmtoon - prom dress (Traducción al Español)

annotations:
I hold so many small regrets
 And what-ifs down inside my head
 Some confidence, it couldn’t hurt me
 My demeanor is often misread

even though i think i experienced high school in a way that felt very true to myself, i still wonder how it would have been different if i had forced myself to partake in aspects that felt more “traditional” to what the high school experience was supposed to be. and because i wasn’t as typically social as others, i think at points i could come off distant and cold, but that’s only because when i get nervous i shut down a bit haha

I keep collections of masks upon my wall
 To try and stop myself from revealing it all
 Affecting others is the last thing I would do
 I keep to myself though I want to break through

admittedly, i am a people pleaser!! i don’t like causing friction or anything, so even though this sounds ~dramatic~ i tend to hide whatever might be going on with me in order to make sure other people are content. sometimes that can feel like wearing a “mask” over my true emotions.

I guess I maybe had a couple expectations
 Thought I’d get to them, but no, I didn’t
 I guess I thought that prom was gonna be fun
 But now I’m sitting on the floor and all I wanna do is run

i definitely went into prom with really high expectations not only for the event, but for myself as well. you want to feel as good as you look and you want prom to be a magical event where everything feels like it’s fallen into place. but, the reality is sometimes much harsher than what you think it will be, and that’s okay.

I’m sitting here, crying in my prom dress
 I’d be the prom queen if crying was a contest
 Make-up is running down, feelings are all around
 How did I get here? I need to know

so, while this song is partially based in truth because i did indeed cry in my prom dress, it’s also based off a tweet i made during prom season of 2018! i just though there was something about the image of being upset in an outfit that stood for such a “happy” iconic moment of high school, so i wrote about it :-)

I can’t help the fact I like to be alone
 It might sound kinda sad, but that’s just what I seem to know
 I tend to handle things usually by myself
 And I can’t ever seem to try and ask for help

again, with being in introvert, i spent a lot of time alone. i had close friends near then end of high school, but didn’t always know where to eat lunch or who to talk to, and would typically take on big challenges alone even though i didn’t need to. asking for help is something i’m still working on, but was definitely a challenge when i was in school.

I’m nearing the end of my fourth year
 I feel like I’ve been lacking, crying too many tears
 Everyone seemed to say it was so great
 But did I miss out? Was it a huge mistake?

i wrote this song in my senior year of high school! i was never one for parties, as i am a gigantic introvert, and as a result felt like i missed out on a lot of the “quintessential” high school experience. also i’m a cancer so i cry, like all the time!

search_results.title: ​feelings are fatal
search_results.lyrics:
​feelings are fatal Lyrics[Verse 1]
I'm happy for you, I'm smiling for you
I'd do anything for you, for you
It’s always for you and never for me
And I need it to stop so let me tell you, please

[Chorus]
I'm always sad and I'm always lonely
But I can’t tell you that I'm breaking slowly
Closed doors, locked in, no keys
Keeping my feelings hidden, there is no ease
I need it to stop and I want to be able to open up
But my feelings are fatal, my feelings are fatal
[Verse 2]
How many times must I keep it inside
I need to let go and I swear that I've tried
But opening up means trusting others
And that’s just too much, I don’t want to bother
So I'll keep it inside and bury it deep
I know it’s not healthy but you won’t hear a peep

[Chorus]
Though I'm always sad and I'm always lonely
I could never tell you that I'm breaking slowly
Closed doors, locked in, no keys
Keeping my feelings hidden, there is no ease
I need it to stop and I want to be able to open up
But my feelings are fatal, my feelings are fatal
My feelings are fatalYou might also like35Embed

body.plain: After releasing “something,” the full version of the song was created and “feelings are fatal” was born.

songs.full_title: Feelings Are Fatal (Cover) by Heya Tamar
songs.title: Feelings Are Fatal (Cover)

songs.full_title: ​​feelings are fatal (Tessa Violet edit) by ​mxmtoon (Ft. Tessa Violet)
songs.title: ​​feelings are fatal (Tessa Violet edit)
songs.title_with_featured: ​​feelings are fatal (Tessa Violet edit) (Ft. Tessa Violet)

annotations:
Closed doors, locked in, no keys
 Keeping my feelings hidden, there is no ease

The image of closed doors, being locked in, and no keys evoke a sense of isolation and darkness, a feeling someone experiencing these emotions has well likely gone through. Yet they continue to wear a “happy mask” that veils their underlying torment, but carrying the weight proves to become more difficult with time.
This can represent a feeling of frustration being locked in your own head. The singer is trying to hide their emotions and feelings in their head constantly.

So I’ll keep it inside and bury it deep
 I know it’s not healthy but you won’t hear a peep

The singer then decides to keep quiet, allowing the cycle to continue while acknowledging the danger that is present in doing so, but they would rather this be the case than having to burden their friends and family.

But opening up means trusting others
 And that’s just too much, I don’t want to bother

Even more though is the fact that the singer has difficulty placing trust into other people. The fear of being judged has isolated them and made them feel helpless and hopeless. The act of trying to be honest with others is no longer worth it, possibly due to the multiple failed attempts.

How many times must I keep it inside
 I need to let go and I swear that I’ve tried
This portion of the song reveals that this is not the first time the singer has tried to be open and honest. Yet, time after time the attempts prove to be a failure.

I need it to stop and I want to be able to open up
 But my feelings are fatal, my feelings are fatal

They’re desperate for the never-ending cycle of silence to end, but at this point of burying their feelings so far down and letting them stew, the prospect of suddenly sharing them is beyond frightening. So scary in fact, that they’re afraid that it will kill the friendships and relationships around them.

Closed doors, locked in, no keys
 Keeping my feelings hidden, there is no ease

The image of closed doors, being locked in, and no keys evoke a sense of isolation and darkness, a feeling someone experiencing these emotions has well likely gone through. Yet they continue to wear a “happy mask” that veils their underlying torment, but carrying the weight proves to become more difficult with time.

I’m always sad and I’m always lonely
 But I can’t tell you that I’m breaking slowly

This is the point in the song where the singer is the most honest. These are the true feelings, the ones that aren’t being shared, the ones pushed to the bottom. But they can’t quite share it with the others like their friends and family because, once again, they do not want to weigh people down with their negative emotions and feelings.

It’s always for you and never for me
 And I need it to stop so let me tell you, please

The singer is at the point in which all their emotional energy is being spent on other people, leaving none for them, and they desperatly need this cycle to stop. They feel unable to share their feelings of sadness, stress, or other negative emotions to avoid being viewed as a “burden” to others.

I’m happy for you, I’m smiling for you
 I’d do anything for you, for you
This portion of the song deals with the idea of putting others before yourself. A trap I often find myself falling into!

I don't really give a damn about the way you touch me when we're alone
You can hold my hand if no one's home

Mama never really learned how to live by herself

[Chorus: Ricky Montgomery]

I need you here to stay
I broke all my bones that day I found you
Crying at the lake
Was it something I said to make you
Feel like you're a burden?

I swear that I would pull you from the tide

[Verse 2: mxmtoon]
Oh, whoa, whoa, whoa
And I know that you know (Yes I know, that you know)
Listen close and move slow (Listen close and move slow)
I can't speak fast or else I'll crack
It's the price I pay for going back
And I've dreamed to be seen (I've dreamed to be seen)
Now I've got it, do I want it?

[Chorus: Ricky Montgomery & mxmtoon]
Oh, baby, I am a wreck when I'm without you
I need you here to stay
I broke all my bones that day I found you
Crying at the lake
Was it something I said to make you
Feel like you're a burden?
Oh, and if I could take it all back
I swear that I would pull you from the tide (I, I)
You might also like[Bridge: mxmtoon, Ricky Montgomery & both]
Darling, when you're fast asleep
I feel your dreams begin to bleed
Saying, "Is it worth it? Is it worth it?
Tell me, is it worth it?
Is it worth it?" (Oh-oh)
'Cause there is something, and there is nothing
There is nothing in between
And in my eyes, there is a tiny dancer
Watching over me, he's singing
"She's a, she's a lady, and I am just a boy"
Singing "She's a, she's a lady, and I am just a line without a--" (Hook)

[Chorus: Ricky Montgomery & mxmtoon]
Oh, baby, I am a wreck when I'm without you
I need you here to stay
I broke all my bones that day I found you
Crying at the lake
Oh, was it something I said to make you
Feel like you're a burden?
Oh, and if I could take it all back
I swear that I would pull you from the tide8Embed

description.plain:
Ricky Montgomery had his first-ever official music collaboration through in a 2021 rerelease of his 2016 song “Line Without a Hook” with indie-pop artist ​mxmtoon.

On February 1st, 2021, Montgomery tweeted a picture showing a featured collaboration with a mystery artist by blurring out their name on the remix’s cover art. Two days later, he tweeted the official art, confirming mxmtoon as the featured artist.



On mxmtoon’s side of all things, she hinted towards the fact she did have plans with Montgomery by replying to a fan on a Tik Tok.



This sparked several theories that there was going to be a collaboration with Montgomery. Several days later, right after Montgomery revealed her to be the featured artist, mxmtoon posted on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/mxmtoon/status/1357375892901814273

body.plain:
Ricky Montgomery had his first-ever official music collaboration through in a 2021 rerelease of his 2016 song “Line Without a Hook” with indie-pop artist ​mxmtoon.

On February 1st, 2021, Montgomery tweeted a picture showing a featured collaboration with a mystery artist by blurring out their name on the remix’s cover art. Two days later, he tweeted the official art, confirming mxmtoon as the featured artist.



On mxmtoon’s side of all things, she hinted towards the fact she did have plans with Montgomery by replying to a fan on a Tik Tok.



This sparked several theories that there was going to be a collaboration with Montgomery. Several days later, right after Montgomery revealed her to be the featured artist, mxmtoon posted on Twitter:

https://twitter.com/mxmtoon/status/1357375892901814273

songs.full_title: Line Without a Hook by Ricky Montgomery
songs.title: Line Without a Hook

annotations:
Darling, when you’re fast asleep
 I feel your dreams begin to bleed
 Saying, ”Is it worth it? Is it worth it?
 Tell me, is it worth it?
 Is it worth it?” (Oh-oh)
Rick and/or Mxmtoon are having doubting dreams or Nightmares about the relationship that’s causing them to sleep talk obviously saying ‘Is it worth it’

It’s the price I pay for going back
 And I’ve dreamed to be seen (I’ve dreamed to be seen)
 Now I’ve got it, do I want it?

This references the fact that Montgomery has taken a break from being a musician in the past, but, now, with his new popularity and a record deal, he has decided to give one more chance to this dream of making music and “being seen” (being successful).

However, this time around, Ricky doesn’t even know if he truly wants to follow this path, which goes back to the fact that he’s seriously considered quitting music in the past.

description.plain:
WELCOME TO GENIUS' MAY 2022 ALBUM RELEASE CALENDAR!!!



For May 2022 singles releases, visit this page



This page highlights the notable albums, EPs, mixtapes, etc, released in all genres throughout May 2022. Each corresponding annotation lists a tracklist, complete with links to the lyrics, hosted here on Genius. The number to the right of the title serves as a counter of how many songs are up on Genius.

HOW CAN YOU HELP?


Adding projects



If there’s a notable project you think should be listed here, add it! Or add a comment at the bottom of the page if you’re not sure. No self-promotion, please.


Adding lyrics



If you transcribed a song, comment on the album’s annotation and it will be linked into the tracklist


Updating dates



If we have any dates wrong, etc, add a comment at the bottom of the page.

search_results.title: ​cliché
search_results.lyrics:
​cliché Lyrics[Intro]
Mmmh, woah
Mmmh

[Verse 1]
I walked into the room and then I saw your face
You looked me in the eye
And then I wanted to erase myself
Erase myself
I didn’t wanna fall but then I stepped right in
I looked down at the ground
And then I felt it right within
It was too late for me (Too late for her)
You took a step forward and tilted your head
With a curious glance, you stared
And I felt dead
Oh my god, I think I’m dying!
[Chorus]
You said “Hey”
And I said “Hello
What’s your name? I’d really like to know about you"
Too bad I stopped at “Hello”

[Verse 2]
I just stared
And you grinned
And looked right back
It felt like just one big whirlwind
One big emotional whirlwind
Over the next few days, we got to talking
With every single word I started falling farther
Farther and farther for you

[Refrain]
You were so witty and so charming
Swept me off my feet
You made me laugh, you made me blush
No one could compete (No one could compete)

[Pre-Chorus]
It seemed too good to be true (It was too good to be true)
I wanted to be with you (And only with you)
We clicked like Legos
Or the clacking of tap shoes
You might also like[Chorus]
You said “Hey”
I said “Hello
How was your day?”
You said “Better now”, with a smile
Oh, what a cliché, but it, to be honest, it made my day

[Verse 3]
I didn’t wanna fall, but then I stepped right in
I looked up at your face
And those eyes, they drew me in
It was too late for me
And that’s what we were
A simple cliché
It wasn’t made to work
But I wouldn’t have it any other way (Any other way)

[Refrain]
You were so witty and so charming
You swept me off my feet
You made me laugh, you made me blush
Oh, no one could compete (No one could compete)

[Pre-Chorus]
It seemed too good to be true (It was too good to be true)
I wanted to be with you (And only with you)
We clicked like Legos
Or the clacking of tap shoes
[Chorus]
You said “Hey”
I said, “Hello, I gotta know, do you feel this way?”
You said “Yeah I do
But I was scared of what you might say”

[Verse 4]
And that’s all we were
A silly cliché
I still think you’re cute
But maybe it’s better this way
Bah duh duh dum
Bah duh duh dum
Bah duh duh duh duh dum

[Outro]
That’s okay
We’re just a little cliché
A little cliché
But that’s okay!24Embed

description.plain: Adorably sung out of tune (it’s slightly flat), ​cliché is the first song from mxmtoon’s debut extended play, plum blossom. It is an innocent falling-in-love story detailing her new enamorment with an attractive beloved.

song.title: ​cliché

body.plain: Adorably sung out of tune (it’s slightly flat), ​cliché is the first song from mxmtoon’s debut extended play, plum blossom. It is an innocent falling-in-love story detailing her new enamorment with an attractive beloved.

annotations:
With every single word I started falling farther
 Farther and farther for you
Mxmtoon shows in these lyrics that as her and her love interest started connecting and talking, she kept falling more and more in love with them.
I didn’t wanna fall, but then I stepped right in
She’s saying that falling in love with the mentioned person wasn’t on person, it just happened and one day she realized it.

It wasn’t made to work
 But I wouldn’t have it any other way (Any other way)
usually cliché relationships don’t work out as they fade with time but she wouldn’t change anything.

We clicked like Legos
 Or the clacking of tap shoes
this shows how they just started getting along like they were meant to be.

What’s your name? I’d really like to know about you”
 Too bad I stopped at “Hello”
mxmtoon shows how she got flustered around him and she was hooped falling more and more in love with every word.

I didn’t wanna fall but then I stepped right in
 I looked down at the ground
 And then I felt it right within
The artist mxmtoon had expressed the feeling of not wanting to feel some sort of attraction to the person they have met. However, despite being alert, it had happen anyways.

description.plain:
This song is mxmtoon’s first single since her 2019 album the masquerade. Maia has said in a tweet that “fever dream” is about what’s it’s been like for her to navigate a music career so far.

https://twitter.com/mxmtoon/status/1220390970447073280?s=20

She fully dives into what exactly this song means to her while talking to Invertebrate:

That track meant a lot to me when it came out because it was really, actually about taking a leap of faith into the music industry and doing something that was really daunting and scary for me, and still is every single day as I approach my job. But it was also the first song that I released where it was co-written by other people and I was working with producers in a session environment for the first time and I think that that song really showcased and helped me understand when I made it back in August of last year, kind of how I wanted to continue making music going into 2020.“
-mxmtoon, via Invertebrate, April 2020

song.title: ​fever dream

body.plain:
This song is mxmtoon’s first single since her 2019 album the masquerade. Maia has said in a tweet that “fever dream” is about what’s it’s been like for her to navigate a music career so far.

https://twitter.com/mxmtoon/status/1220390970447073280?s=20

She fully dives into what exactly this song means to her while talking to Invertebrate:

That track meant a lot to me when it came out because it was really, actually about taking a leap of faith into the music industry and doing something that was really daunting and scary for me, and still is every single day as I approach my job. But it was also the first song that I released where it was co-written by other people and I was working with producers in a session environment for the first time and I think that that song really showcased and helped me understand when I made it back in August of last year, kind of how I wanted to continue making music going into 2020.“
-mxmtoon, via Invertebrate, April 2020

songs.full_title: ​mxmtoon - fever dream (Tradução em Português) by Genius Brasil Traduções
songs.title: ​mxmtoon - fever dream (Tradução em Português)

annotations: Days are only footprints in the snow
Days, like footprints in the snow, are temporary, and they always seem to be in the past. They’re easy to look back at, but we should remember to enjoy the ones we’re in.
Life’s a losing game when you don’t play

This is a malaphor. Two figures of speech are blended to create a new saying, the figures of speech here being “Life’s a losing game” and “You lose every game you don’t play”. (The latter is some variation of “You can’t score if you don’t shoot”.)

Life might be a losing game, but if you don’t play by really living your life, then you’ve already lost. In the song, Maia takes every opportunity to escape the mundane and ordinary.
Don’t hold your cards too close is what they say

According to the Cambridge Dictionary, to hold your cards close to your chest means that you’re keeping your intended actions secret.

By not doing this, someone is open and carefree about their life. This further ties into the theme that Maia is taking every chance she has and every opportunity she gets.

description.plain: The lead single by indie singer Maia or mxmtoon ahead of her sophomore album, rising. Promotion for this single began via social media on Jan 27 2022. The single was officially released on Feb 8 of the same year. This was released ahead of her “rising” world tour with chloe moriondo and Ricky Montgomery.

song.title: ​​mona lisa

body.plain: The lead single by indie singer Maia or mxmtoon ahead of her sophomore album, rising. Promotion for this single began via social media on Jan 27 2022. The single was officially released on Feb 8 of the same year. This was released ahead of her “rising” world tour with chloe moriondo and Ricky Montgomery.

songs.full_title: ​mxmtoon - mona lisa (Tradução em Português) by Genius Brasil Traduções
songs.title: ​mxmtoon - mona lisa (Tradução em Português)

annotations: The way that Van Gogh uses yellow or the self in Frida Kahlo

Vincent van Gogh was a Dutch Post-Impressionist painter, most well known for his works The Starry Night (1889) and Sunflowers (1887).



One of van Gogh’s signature features in his art was the use of the color yellow, an example pictured in “Sunflowers” above. In this and many other paintings throughout his career, Van Gogh used a color palette made up almost exclusively of yellow.

Frida Kahlo was a Mexican painter most well known for her self portraits, one of which is pictured below:



Kahlo explored her identity through these portraits as they evolved over the years. She is now seen as an icon in not only art history, but also the Chicano community, feminism and for the LGBTQ+ community.
I think I’m ready for my close-up, baby
This could be a reference to the popular line “Mr DeMille, I’m ready for my close-up” from the movie Sunset Boulevard, spoken by the character Norma Desmond.
I wanna be a Mona Lisa, ah-ah

In an episode of Song Exploder, mxmtoon spoke about the lack of representation she saw for herself as she was growing up.

You know, I didn’t grow up with a lot of forms of representation that really felt like reflected my identity, or self, and, you know, even thinking about something as famous as a painting like the Mona Lisa… the Mona Lisa is a white woman, and so I didn’t really necessarily see myself in major forms of, like, famous media, whether it was paintings or plays or movies or tv shows, so it was fun to kind of think about, ‘OK. I’m gonna make a song that has a very famous painting as the title, and I’m gonna be the famous painting.’

I’ve always played the part of Shakespeare
 I hide behind the ink and pen

The first of the notorious figures of arts mentioned by mxmtoon throughout the song is the English novelist and poet William Shakespeare, who has been hailed as one of the most influential Western authors of all time, both at national and international level.



During a Q&A with fans on TikTok, the artist was asked about what the image of Mona Lisa has to do with Shakespeare to begin with. This was her response:


Great question. Shakespeare has nothing to do with Leonardo da Vinci’s Mona Lisa, and that’s actually the point of the song. Shakespeare, as we know, is a famous playwright. He is a writer. The first line of the song is “I’ve always played the part of Shakespeare. I hide behind the ink and pen”. The line is just meant to establish the fact that I am the creator; I am the writer. Bringing in Leonardo da Vinci’s Mona Lisa is about bringing one the most iconic pieces of portraiture, the Mona Lisa, and kind of that constant desire we as creators have to be the subject of the art. You want to be the muse. You want to be the portrait that’s talked about. You don’t always want to be Shakespeare. You don’t want to have to write a play.

I have other references too, to like Van Gogh’s use of yellow in his paintings, and how he loved the color yellow. Wanting to be loved like the color yellow.

Those people and the things they’ve painted, the things they’ve written, are not connected, but it’s about the opposition between the two.
Think that I’m ready to start a new chapter

This is a really cool line in the song, because this is mxmtoon’s first release since dawn & dusk of late 2020, and the sound of this song is a change for her. This song not only is a new chapter in her life, but her career as well.
